ProcessingConfiguration

public ProcessingConfiguration(FileTable musicFileList,
                               java.lang.String inputFeatureList,
                               java.lang.String reductionSteps,
                               java.lang.Integer partitionSize,
                               java.lang.Integer partitionOverlap,
                               java.lang.String conversionStep,
                               java.lang.String featureDescription)
Standard constructor

Parameters:
inputMusicFile - Music file list for feature processing
inputFeatureList - List with features to process
reductionSteps - Processing steps (feature or time dimension processing)
partitionSize - Partition size (each partition -> input for classification)
partitionOverlap - Partition overlap
conversionStep - Method for conversion of matrix (features over time) to vector
featureDescription - Feature description, if required
